'''Put Them To Rest''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] located in [[Yashiori Island]], [[Inazuma]]. It consists of defeating the [[Ochimusha]] that appear upon interacting with an electrified '''Sword Hilt''' while carrying an [[Electrograna]] to put the samurais' spirits to final rest.

==Notes==
* Completing this '''Hidden Exploration Objective''' grants the ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' achievement "[[Rest in Peace]]."
* If the player loses the fight or teleports away, they can return and retry the fight.
* A [[Common Chest]] will spawn once the Ochimusha is defeated.
